DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the performance of an investigational blood glucose meter with the Contour sensor strip. It was decided that this investigational monitoring system would not be part of a regulatory submission and it will not proceed to marketed product.
DOC.brief_title: Performance of an Investigational Blood Glucose Monitoring System in a Clinical Setting
DOC.criteria: Males and females, 18 years of age and above Type 1 or type 2 diabetes Currently selftesting blood glucose at home at least twice daily Able to speak, read, and understand English Willing to complete all study procedures Currently Pregnant Hemophilia or any other bleeding disorder Employee of competitive medical device company Cognitive disorder or other condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, would put the person at risk or seriously compromise the integrity of the study
